lejos.robotics

Interface BaseMotor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DCMotor, RegulatedMotor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRegulatedMotor, BasicMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor, EV3MediumRegulatedMotor, NXTRegulatedMotor, UnregulatedMotor

    public interface BaseMotor
    Base motors interface. Contains basic movement commands.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backward()
      Causes motors to rotate backwards until stop() or flt() is called.
      void brake() 
      void coast()
      Motor loses all power, causing the rotor to float freely to a stop.
      void forward()
      Causes motors to rotate forward until stop() or flt() is called.
      void hold() 
      boolean isMoving()
      Return true if the motors is moving.
      void reverseDirection() 
      void stop()
      Causes motors to stop immediately.

    • Method Detail

      • forward

        void forward()
        Causes motors to rotate forward until stop() or flt() is called.

      • backward

        void backward()
        Causes motors to rotate backwards until stop() or flt() is called.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Causes motors to stop immediately. It will resist any further motion. Cancels any rotate() orders in progress.

      • coast

        void coast()
        Motor loses all power, causing the rotor to float freely to a stop. This is not the same as stopping, which locks the rotor.

      • brake

        void brake()

      • hold

        void hold()

      • isMoving

        boolean isMoving()
        Return true if the motors is moving.
        Returns:
        true if the motors is currently in motion, false if stopped.

      • reverseDirection

        void reverseDirection()
